polis adhikari wika‡∑äramasinha polis adhikari wika‡∑äramasinha yatathata thamange ha thama pawule aarakshawa pawarimata janapathi sirisenata wika‡∑äramasinha kala pa‡∑ärakashayak pamanak pa‡∑äramanawathwa thibe.ohu eelaga polispathi lesa namkerenu athayi boho dena sitha siti bawa rahasak nowe.namuth gataluwak atha.thaman yatathe rate samastha aarakshaka paddathiyama,buddhi anshayada athuluwa thabagena siti hitapu janadhipathiwaraya pawasanne wika‡∑äramasinha thamanta erehiwa oththu sapayime nitharawa siti bawayi.ohu atha etharam balayak thibunada ohuge aarakshawa bharawa siti polis niladhariya oththu sapayime nitharawa siti bawa ohuta hadunaganimata nohakiwa thibe.rajapaksha niwaradi nam ohuta erehiwa thibi athi pa‡∑äradhana badhakaya wanne polis adhikari wika‡∑äramasinhaya.thamanta hitapu janapathiwarayagen asadharanakam siduwu bawa pawasana,ema hitapu janapathiwarayama ohuta erehiwa kumantha‡∑ärana yedunu bawa kiyana wika‡∑äramasinha wannekuta thamange aarakshawa bharadimata janapathi sirisena katayuthu kara thibima suluwen thakiya hakkak nowe.deshapalagnyayin thamange mathimathanthara gana wina aarakshawa gana pa‡∑äramanawath tharam wimasilimath nowana bawa penwa dena awasthawak lesa meya dakwiya hakiya.meya polispathiwarayata ayath rajakariyakayi kenekuta kiwahakiwuwath polispathi en.ke ilangakon ha polis adhikari wika‡∑äramasinha athara thibena sabadathawata kisiwekutath rahasak nowe.me sabadathawaya nisama atham awasthawaladi apakshapathi niladhariyeku lesa namak dinagena sitina ilangakontada pakshapathiwa katayuthu kirimata siduwiya.hitapu janapathi samaye ohu upayashiliwa polis departhamenthuwe niladharinta janadhipathi rajapakshata sahaya dakwannayi eeththu ganwimata uthsaha kirima ewan ek awasthawaki.ee sadaha ohu bhawitha kale polis departhamenthuwema sampath yodagena mudranaya kala alankara poth pinchaki.ehi sadahanwa thibune mahinda rajapaksha polis departhamenthuwa wenuwen sidukara athi meheyayi.
eheyin pataka bhawathunta aayachanayak kirimata mata atha.

aanandaya, idin me wiharayen wiharana karana ee mahanahata bhashyakatha pinisa sitha name nam, he yam kathayek hina gramya puhudunan kerehi watena anaryya anartha sanhitha we da, nirwedaya pinisa no wate da, wiraga ya pinisa no wate da, nirodhaya pinisa no wate da, upashamaya pinisa no wate da, abhignya pinisa no wate da, sambodhaya pinisa no wate da, nirwanaya pinisa no wate da, ee kebandu katha ya yath: rajakatha, chaurakatha, mahamathrakatha, senakatha, bhayakatha, yuddhakatha, aaharakatha, panakatha, wasthrakatha, shayanakatha, malakatha, gandhakatha, gnyathikatha, yanakatha, gramakatha, nigamakatha, nagarakatha, janapadakatha, sthrikatha, purushakatha, surakatha, withikatha, kumbhasthanakatha, purwaprethakatha, nanathwakatha, lokayathakatha, samudrikakatha, ithibhawabhawakatha yayi mese ho mese mebandu wu ho katha no kiyami‚Äô kiya meseyin ehi samapragnyana athi weyi.
